name: 尹世洵
objective: To introduce design and investigation concepts and their application to steel structural components.
schedule:
1. Introduction to design requirements and analysis, loads, building codes, specifications (1st week)
2. Concepts and design philosophies in structural steel design. (2nd week)
3. Analysis and design of tension members. (3rd~4th week)
4. Analysis and design of compression members. (5th~8th week)
5. Analysis and design of flexural members. (9th~12th week)
6. Analysis and design of beam-columns. (13th~14th week)
7. Bolted and Welded connections (15th~17th week)
scorePolicy:
Homeworks and quizzes　　20%
Midterm exam　　　　40%
Final exam　　　　40%
materials:
1. Structural Steel Design, Jack C. McCormac, 4th edition
2. AISC, Manual of Steel Construction, Load and Resistance Factor Design
